entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
